description.black-white:
The user drenches the target in a special
poisonous liquid. Its power is doubled
if the target is poisoned.

effect.full: Inflicts regular damage.  If the target is poisoned, this move has double power.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts double damage if the target is Poisoned.
